insights.title: Insights
insights.details: This section provides an overview of stat results for branchs and items

collections.title: Stat Locations
collections.details: All stat items and stat results are based on individule locations. These location can be organized by department and location group.

stats.title: Stat Items
stats.details: Each of the stat items are grouped by topic and categories. Use this section to manage these collections.

settings.title: Settings
settings.details: Use this section to manage general settings.
